content:
I am an enthusiast in deep learning and reinforcement learning with a proficient knowledge also in the domain of robotic automation and ROS.
Currently, I am working as a Industrial Data Science Enginieer at OBO Bettermann GmbH where my role is to improve production efficiency using novel machine learning and deep learning techniques. Also, during my master thesis, I worked on a research topic that involved coordinating two UR5 robots (Universal Robots) using Reinforcement Learning with ROS as a robotic automation tool.
summary:
I am an enthusiast in deep learning and reinforcement learning with a proficient knowledge also in the domain of robotic automation and ROS.
Currently, I am working as a Industrial Data Science Enginieer at OBO Bettermann GmbH where my role is to improve production efficiency using novel machine learning and deep learning techniques.
title: Murtaza Khuzema Basuwala

summary: Two UR5 robots reach targets specified within their own workspace and coordinate at a common point using Reinforcement Learning
title: Coordinating Two UR5 Robots using Reinforcement Learning

summary: Designing an RL agent for the actuator of the PSM machine to reach the parcel position in the most optimum way.
title: Motion control of a peristaltic sorting machine using reinforcement learning

summary: Here two UR5 robots are coordinated using planning pipelines from ROS Moveit to execute a pick-and-place type scenraio.
title: Pick and Place using ROS/MoveIt

summary: A linear and non-linear controller were designed for a bioreactor system to control the flow of glucose into the substrate for producing biomass.
title: Designing a Non-Linear controller for a bioreactor system

summary: A UR5 robot arm is trained using Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) to reach 5 random targets defined in the environment and evaluated on three new targets.
title: Training a UR5 Robot on 5 random targets using Reinforcement Learning

summary: Classical ML models such as logistic regression, random forest and gradient boosting are used to train on cat-in-the-dat dataset.
title: Classic Machine Learning Models
